title: Switch UI to Feedback Mode: single Give Feedback CTA, external Google Form, and remove pricing copy

requirements.text: Replace any “Join Early Access” and/or email-capture UI elements with a single “Give Feedback” call-to-action (CTA) throughout the app, keeping all other UI and features unchanged.

quotes: Replace any “Join Early Access” / email capture with a single “Give Feedback” CTA.
Keep everything else the same. No rebuild of features, just UI copy + links.

acceptanceCriteria: No UI in the app asks users to join early access or capture an email address.
Any prior early-access CTA copy is replaced with a single CTA labeled exactly “Give Feedback”.
No functional changes are introduced beyond UI copy/link adjustments.

requirements.text: Update the primary “Give Feedback” CTA (currently in the main navigation) so that clicking it opens the Google Form https://forms.gle/gQA8LJEqMBNJsooL6 in a new browser tab, instead of opening an in-app feedback dialog.

quotes: The “Give Feedback” button should open this Google Form (new tab): https://forms.gle/gQA8LJEqMBNJsooL6

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “Give Feedback” opens https://forms.gle/gQA8LJEqMBNJsooL6 in a new tab (uses target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer" or equivalent).
The in-app modal dialog currently used for feedback collection is no longer shown from the navigation CTA.

requirements.text: After the user initiates feedback submission flow, display the thank-you message exactly: “Thanks — your feedback helps shape what we build next.”

quotes:
After submit, show a simple thank-you message:
“Thanks — your feedback helps shape what we build next.”

acceptanceCriteria: A thank-you message is displayed to the user with the exact text: “Thanks — your feedback helps shape what we build next.”
The message is shown in-app (e.g., toast/banner/inline message) without requiring backend changes.

requirements.text: Remove the footer line that includes “Pro (£19/month) coming soon” and remove any other pricing mentions from the footer and header so no pricing appears there.

quotes: Remove the “Pro (£19/month) coming soon” line from the footer (hide pricing).
Also remove any other pricing mentions from the footer and header (no price anywhere).

acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer displays the text “Pro (£19/month) coming soon.”
No pricing text (currency symbols, amounts, or price-related copy) appears in the app header or footer.
All other footer/header content remains intact aside from the removed pricing mentions.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain single-actor (backend/main.mo); do not introduce additional backend services.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not rebuild or redesign existing features beyond the requested UI copy/link updates.
Do not add or change authentication flows (no new signup/login mechanisms).
Do not add backend persistence for feedback submissions (Google Form only).
